thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 02 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hologic Q2 GAAP Loss Per Share $2.46

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hologic Q2 GAAP Loss Per Share $2.46
text:
Hologic Inc:
* HOLOGIC ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR SECOND QUARTER OF FISCAL 2018
* Q2 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.53
* Q2 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $2.46 * Q2 REVENUE $789.3 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $781.8 MILLION
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.53 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* LOWERING OUR FULL-YEAR 2018 REVENUE GUIDANCE
* SEES 2018 GAAP REVENUE $3,180 MILLION TO $3,210 MILLION * REITERATING NON-GAAP EPS GUIDANCE FOR YEAR
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.26, REVENUE VIEW $3.25 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
